textContent: I found Shreyans a true Polyglot Programming Engineer who could not only contribute to Research items but also capable to develop a quality code for products. I am amazed by his strong fundamentals and practical knowledge in Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. Shreyans is a go-to asset for the company when it comes to code using Python and C# programming knowledge. Shreyans is one of the best multi-lingual programmers and Principal Software Engineer we have for sure.
